Reviews.Title: an amazing camera ever
Reviews.Author: kazuko
Reviews.Content: This digital camera enables me to take amazing photos. Very clear, bright and close to what you actually see. Sometimes too many functions confuse me but I can always use 'premium auto' mode. It is sometimes difficult to focus on what you want in this mode, though. As I am not a 'camera guy', I need to learn more from the manual. BUT the camera case was not perfect as it is big but it was hard to take the camera out if I put other things in this case. A tripod is useful when you want to take 'perfect' night view. 8GB card was class4 so maybe it is a bit slow, I guess.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful pocket camera!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer "Jennifer"
Reviews.Content: After reading David Pogue's review in the NY Times (which said "Let me cut to the chase- no pictures this good have ever come from a camera this small) I decided to buy this camera. I'd been disappointed by a highly rated Canon pocket camera, and I found my phone had a faster shutter speed and took better pictures. I wasn't ready to go the SLR route, and don't want to carry around anything that big. This camera has everything promised, and then some. I haven't discovered everything it can do yet, and I've had it for several months. It takes super high quality, professional pictures and videos. The only drawback is the lack of a manual - you just have to spend some time with it and try lots of different settings and functions.
